actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for expenses incurred in contiguous less-developed countries.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals a limited income tax dedication for handicraft items purchases in Mexico between 1975 and 1981.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a deduction for expenses incurred in contiguous less-developed countries.
